name: Robot C++ Development
postCreateCommand: bash -c 'apt-get update && apt-get install -y libboost-all-dev && cd /tmp && git clone --depth 1 --branch v3.10.0 https://github.com/catchorg/Catch2.git && cd Catch2 && cmake -B build -S . -DBUILD_TESTING=OFF && cmake --build build --target install && if [ -n "$SSH_AUTH_SOCK" ]; then mkdir -p ~/.ssh && ssh-add -L 2>/dev/null | head -1 > ~/.ssh/id_ed25519.pub && git config --global user.signingkey ~/.ssh/id_ed25519.pub; fi'
